Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/124th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Lowe, 123rd, then over normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/124th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 127th, Lowe, 123rd, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/124th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
